problem_statement: After cloning, navigation links and internal routing frequently break (wrong href, missing pages, JS-only routing).
before_symptom: Clicks do nothing; 404 on internal pages; anchors broken; wrong basePath; SPA routes not resolved.
after_expected: All primary nav links open a valid page, return HTTP 200 (or expected redirect), and render non-empty content.
gate_condition: Smoke test passes for required link set (nav/footer + 10 critical routes).
